wikitext.*:
'''THUS''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "evil mist, fog, Darkness".<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, p. 183 (root appearing as "√THUS-"</ref>
==Derivatives==
*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''thūsē''
**[[Sindarin]] ''thû'' ("horrible darkness, black mist")<ref name=PE17/>

==Other versions==
In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], the root THUS (given no signification) yields the Primitive Quendian form ''thausā'', from which derives Quenya ([[Qenya]]) ''[[saura]]''. From this root also derives [[Noldorin]] ''thaw'' "corrupt, rotten", and ''thû'' "stench" (used as a proper name, ''[[Thû]]''.<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 393 (root appearing as "THUS-")</ref>
